title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management        Tower Butte looks out over Lake Powell NPS Photo       Encompassing over 1.2 million acres, Glen Canyon National Recreation Area offers unparalleled opportunities for water-based & backcountry recreation. The recreation area stretches for hundreds of miles from Lees Ferry in Arizona to the Orange Cliffs of southern Utah, encompassing scenic vistas, geologic wonders, and a panorama of human history.      Taking Care of Glen Canyon Park Statistics How many people visit Glen Canyon National Recreation Area each year? What do they do? Laws & Policies Glen Canyon National Recreation Area is subject to Federal, State (Arizona & Utah), and local laws and regulations. Please be aware of these regulations when you visit. Freedom of Information Act It is your right to request specific documents from the government. Check here to see how.
